carousel.title: 📈 AI Adoption in Supply Chains Surges
carousel.content: 72% of supply chain leaders have invested in AI technologies, enhancing efficiency and resilience.

carousel.title: 🌐 U.S.-Ukraine Minerals Deal Faces Uncertainty
carousel.content: A recent meeting between President Trump and President Zelenskyy ended abruptly, casting doubt on the proposed critical minerals agreement.

carousel.title: 🏭 Companies Diversify Supply Chains
carousel.content: Businesses are restructuring supply networks, with 60% altering supply chains to navigate economic unpredictability.

carousel.title: 🤖 Oracle Introduces AI Agents for Supply Chain Automation
carousel.content: Oracle has launched AI-driven agents to automate routine supply chain tasks, aiming to boost efficiency and decision-making.

carousel.title: 🌍 Arctic Geopolitics in Flux
carousel.content: The ongoing Russo-Ukrainian conflict is impacting Arctic governance, with increased militarization and shifting alliances among Arctic nations.
